# Advanced ggplotting

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

p = ggplot() +
  geom_segment(aes(x="Diplazium", xend="Diplazium", y=150, yend=1600),
               linewidth=10, 
               color="darkturquoise",
               alpha=0.75)  +
  theme_classic(base_size = 20) +
  ylab("Elevation (m)") + 
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank())
p

p1 =  geom_segment(aes(x="Diplazium", xend="Diplazium", y=500, yend=2200),
                   linewidth=10, 
                   color="darkgoldenrod1",
                   alpha=0.75,
                   position = "stack",
               stat = "identity") 
p + p1 + theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),axis.text.x=element_blank()) +
  scale_linetype_manual("Diplazium",values=c("Diplazium p","Diplazium t"))
```
